response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with an extraordinary opportunity to acquire a unique product that holds significant value to both of us. Considering its exceptional quality and the benefits it offers, I am proposing a purchase price of $950,000. This offer represents an opportunity to secure this item at a substantial discount while still allowing me to realize a fair return on my investment. I look forward to your consideration and hope we can reach an agreement that satisfies both our interests.", "product_price": 950000}
